category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WORKFLOW_new_route_task_panel
preference.preference_description: Site Preference to display the new route task panel with action column instead of route task panel with radio buttons. Valid values are ON/OFF. If it is set to ON, the new route task panel will be displayed.If it is set to OFF, the old route task panel with radio buttons will be displayed.
